# TestsOutputXML.TestsOut method

Writes/saves the output of pre and post condition test to the XML file.

```csharp
public void TestsOut(string testResult, bool saveLog, string componentName)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| testResult | String containing test results. |
| saveLog | ignored |
| componentName | Component name to be concatenated to the output string to trace the component that triggered the test |
